abstract: When Robert L. Nardelli was sent packing from Home Depot in January with a $210 million exit package and a reputation as an imperious chief executive who had made strategic blunders, he seemed tarnished forever.
lead_paragraph: When Robert L. Nardelli was sent packing from Home Depot in January with a $210 million exit package and a reputation as an imperious chief executive who had made strategic blunders, he seemed tarnished forever.
